pages.text: $(l)$(item)Amulet Belt$() - is a strange leather belt that allows you to wear up to 6 amulets(1 in main slot, 5 in belt) at the same time!$(br2)To open it's inventory press $(l)$(k:elementalamulets.open_belt_gui)$() while wearing it

pages.title: How to obtain
pages.text: It's a very rare artifact, you buy it from the Jeweller at master level( 5 ).$(br2)Other ways of obtaining it coming soon!
